trackpad:StrongOption.NAME: Strong
trackpad:StrongOption.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Strength at the start of each combat.

trackpad:SwiftOption.NAME: Swift
trackpad:SwiftOption.DESCRIPTION: Gain 2 Dexterity at the start of each combat.

trackpad:HealthyOption.NAME: Healthy
trackpad:HealthyOption.DESCRIPTION: Heal 3 HP at the start of each combat.

trackpad:EnergeticOption.NAME: Energetic
trackpad:EnergeticOption.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] at the start of each combat.

trackpad:WealthyOption.NAME: Wealthy
trackpad:WealthyOption.DESCRIPTION: Gain 8 gold at the start of each combat.

trackpad:CreativeOption.NAME: Creative
trackpad:CreativeOption.DESCRIPTION: Choose 1 of 3 cards to shuffle into your draw pile at the start of each combat.

trackpad:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
trackpad:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [R] times. NL (Deal !ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

trackpad:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
trackpad:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

trackpad:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
trackpad:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
trackpad:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

trackpad:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
trackpad:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.
